name: Small Town Animation Studios
description: This Black-owned studio focuses on developing and producing 2D and 3D animated feature films and television series, with a commitment to environmental sustainability

name: BWA Studios
description: A Black female-owned animation house that creates and produces programming and content for all platforms, aiming to build equity in the animation industry by recruiting Black women, women of color, and nonbinary people of color

name: Martian Blueberry
description: Co-founded by Carl Jones, this animation powerhouse focuses on creating content that resonates with diverse communities, drawing on Jones's experience with shows like "The Boondocks" and "Black Dynamite."

name: Lion Forge Entertainment
description: Founded by David Steward II, this Academy Award-winning studio creates cinematic comics, games, and animation that celebrate diverse voices

name: Black Women Animate (BWAS)
description: Founded by Taylor K. Shaw, BWAS is a movement and studio that empowers Black women and promotes diverse stories through creative services and training programs focused on DEI

name: Chaz Bottoms Animation Studios (CBA Studios)
address: Not available (Based in Los Angeles, but the prompt requested Georgia businesses)
description: A 2D animation studio founded by Chaz Bottoms, known for its commitment to diversity and powerful storytelling, with clients including Disney and Apple TV

name: Virtual Animation Studio
description: Founded by Christo Perry Black ("Stoart"), this Black-owned studio has clients including Universal Music Group, Bleacher Report, and Hulu

name: Bento Box ATL
description: A full-service animation studio that produces programming for broadcast, cable, and streaming networks, as well as commercials and branded content, with a strong focus on 2D animation

name: Snap Animation Studio
description: A creative studio helping brands achieve clear and effective communication through engaging motion graphics and explainer videos

name: Creative Overdose Studios
description: A boutique animation studio focused on handcrafted 2D animation experiences for film and TV production
